Content.Text:
<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, hey, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Hey, um... There's something I think we should
talk about.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I really hope I've just got the wrong idea about all
of this, but...recently, it feels like you,
um...don't love me all that much anymore.
<PAGE>
I'm even kinda wondering if you, like, hate me
now.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
Th-there's no way, right? I mean, we're still in
love, right? But, if you really do want us to break
up, then...
No way. Let's stay together!
We should totally break up.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Right! I thought so! Whew. I knew there was no
way that craziness could be true. I feel so much
better now!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Still...
<PAGE>
It's 'cause we haven't been talking to each other
a lot lately that I got that idea in the first place.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>So I think we should make lots more time to
hang out an' talk together, just the two of us.
'Kay, <MYNAME>?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<ACTION_HEART_BREAK>Oh... Yeah, can't say I'm surprised.
<PAGE>
But don't worry! Don't worry. I'm tough. I'm
totally used to gettin' dumped. I'll be okay!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
From now on, we can be friends. A farmer
meetin' another farmer comin' through the rye,
or somethin' like that!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, <MYNAME>. Perfect timing. I think there is
something we need to discuss.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Let me be frank. ...Do you still love me?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Given your attitude towards me of late, I cannot
help but think you are searching for an excuse to
break up.
<PAGE>
Perhaps it's concern for me that's kept you from
expressing that out loud, but enough is enough.
Tell me what you think.
I want to stay together.
We should break up.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I see. So you do not, in fact, wish to break up
with me?
<PAGE>
If you say so, <MYNAME>, I will believe you. I
wish for us to stay together, as well.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But there is no denying that your attitude
towards me has changed.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
No matter what the reason, you don't need to
hold things inside and fret over them alone.
Come to me and we'll talk it over.
<PAGE>
You and I are a couple, correct? You can
confide in me.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
I see. I thought this day would come eventually.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><ACTION_HEART_BREAK>I prepared myself for it a long time ago. Let
us...be apart from each other.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Of course, I will still look forward to seeing you,
as a friend and fellow resident of this town.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>! Perfect timing. We need to talk.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I think it's best if I just come out and say it. I still
love you, but recently...I'm starting to think
things have been different between us.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD><MYNAME>, are you still in love with me? Or do
you think we should...break up?

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
It feels like you're avoiding me. Maybe I'm
overthinking things -- I hope so! -- but my gut is
usually spot on about this kind of thing.
<PAGE>
That's why I want us to make things perfectly
clear now. <MYNAME>, do you think we should
break up?
I don't want to break up.
We should end things now.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_PATI>
...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh. Okay. Whew! That's a load off my mind.
<PAGE>
I know I'm the one who brought it up, but I was
going to be really depressed if you'd said yes.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I feel a lot better now, that's for sure!

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
...Still, I have to admit, you've been pretty
distant lately, and it's had me worried.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know we both have busy lives, so we can't
spend all day chatting with one another...
<PAGE>
But I do think we should at least try to talk more
often and spend some time together, with some
degree of regularity.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh. Okay. I guess, um...we should break up,
then.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><ACTION_HEART_BREAK>I really enjoyed being with you, <MYNAME>.
Thanks for everything.

<FACE_REGER><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Let's at least stay friends, though, okay? I won't
hold a grudge or anything, so feel free to drop
by the restaurant like...nothing happened...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. I was just looking for you. There's a
matter of some importance I think we should
discuss.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I believe it would be best for us both if we were
to break up.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
To be blunt, I've grown a little...bored of being
your significant other. And I'd like for us to go
our separate ways.
I don't want to!
You're right. We should.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>...Oh, please, I-I didn't mean to make you so sad!
I was merely...testing you. I didn't mean what I
said.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Recently, I've just gotten the impression that
you've been putting distance between us. I
thought maybe you'd found someone else.
<PAGE>
So I deliberately said those things to make it
easier for you to leave me, should you choose
to.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But if you don't want to leave, that's another
story entirely! If it were up to me, I'd never let
you go.
<PAGE>
So it seems you've let your one chance to leave
me slip through your fingers...and now you're
stuck with me, forever! How sad for you...

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
But now that that unpleasantness is out of the
way, I do think we need to discuss your attitude
of late. You have not been very...girlfriendly.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>If you truly do still love me, and you wish to
maintain this relationship, I'd appreciate it if
you'd express that more often.
<PAGE>
Is that acceptable?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I wish you the best of luck with your new love.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><ACTION_HEART_BREAK>I very much enjoyed the time we spent together.

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
From now on, we shall be as friends. I look
forward to seeing you again, as a fellow resident
of this fine town.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Good timing. There's something I want to clear
up.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
Have you...fallen out of love with me?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You always used to hang around me, even when
I didn't want you there. But now, I can hardly
find you anywhere!
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>At first, I thought you were just busy...but then I
learned that you were still finding the time to talk
with the other men in town!
<PAGE>
I'm so confused. Do you love me? Or would it
be best if we...broke up?
I don't want to break up.
We should break up.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Really...?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Oh. I, uh... I'm sorry I got mad and yelled at you.
I guess I was just getting paranoid.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
...But if that's the case, you need to quit being
so stand-offish! Even if you are busy, you can at
least come say "hi" to me from time to time!
<PAGE>
And if you ever do have something you need to
say to me, just come and say it!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Doesn't being together mean that we trust each
other enough to speak our minds?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>From now on, if you ever have anything you
need to talk about, just tell me! You got it?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<ACTION_HEART_BREAK>Oh. ...Okay. So as of now, the two of us are
through. I guess...thanks for everything, and
take care.

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You don't have to make yourself come talk to me
if you don't want to anymore.
<PAGE>
From now on, we're just two people who
happen to live in the same town.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, there's something really important I
think we should talk about.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I hope I'm wrong about this, but lately you've
been feeling really stand-offish.
<PAGE>
Have you...fallen out of love with me?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
If I've got the wrong idea, I'm sorry. But...if that
is the case, I want you to tell me.
<PAGE>
It's really hard to be together when our feelings
aren't on the same page.
I still love you!
I don't love you anymore.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, so I just had the wrong idea. Thank
goodness. I'm sorry for bringing up something
so off the wall.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
But you have been stand-offish lately. That's not
just me.
<PAGE>
I know you're busy, but as your boyfriend, I'd
really like to have at least a little more time to
talk with you.
<PAGE>
I'll try my best to set aside time on my end, too.
Being a couple is work sometimes, but I know
we can do it together.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Oh...Okay.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><ACTION_HEART_BREAK>Then, as much as I don't want to, I guess we
should break up.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Thanks for being with me all this time. I really
enjoyed being your boyfriend.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Let's at least be friends, though. I'd like that.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
My, my. <MYNAME>. After ignoring me for so
long, NOW you come to see me? What could
you possibly want?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Do you think you can play innocent with me?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Do you even remember the last time we spoke
together?
<PAGE>
What were you thinking, leaving your poor
ladylove all alone for such a long time?
<PAGE>
Don't you care for me at all anymore?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
If not, then I think it would be best if we...we
break up.
<PAGE>
Well, <MYNAME>? Answer me.
I do care for you!
We should break up.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
Really...?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Then come see me more often!
<PAGE>
Or am I the only one who thinks true
sweethearts would want to spend as much time
together as possible?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_ANGRY>
If you ever leave me feeling so worried and
insecure again, I will make you regret it! I will
insist we break up!
<PAGE>
So pay me all due attention from now on!
Understand? Good.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<ACTION_HEART_BREAK>Oh. All right. Let us go our separate ways, then.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you for everything, <MYNAME>. I...I am
glad for the time we spent together.
<PAGE>
From now on, we are simply rival farmers. I look
forward to competing against you.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>, I have something very important to
talk to you about. Do you have time to listen?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I think it might be best if we broke up.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Given how you've been acting towards me lately,
I don't think we can stay together.
I don't wanna break up!
We should break up.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you don't, then of course I want to stay with
you, too.
<PAGE>
It's not like I wanted to have this conversation in
the first place.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
But I would appreciate it if you would do more
to show me that you want to stay with me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Storytellers have a rule: "Show, don't tell."
Anyone can say, "I love you." What we do to
show each other, that's what matters.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I know it can be difficult to make time in your
schedule to come see one person day after day
after day.
<PAGE>
I won't ask that of you. All I'd like is for you to
try to come and see me just a little more often.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<ACTION_HEART_BREAK>All right. Well then, thank you for everything,
<MYNAME>. You've given me many happy
memories.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I hope we can still get along together as friends,
though. I'd like that.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Ah! <MYNAME>...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Um... <MYNAME>, listen... I think we need to
talk.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
You hardly ever come to see me anymore.
<PAGE>
Are you trying to avoid me?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
I know I'm super bashful around you, and maybe
I'm not the best girlfriend you could have. Are
you sick of dealing with that?
<PAGE>
Do you...not love me anymore?
I still love you!
I don't love you anymore.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh...Whew.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Thank goodness. I was so worried that you'd tell
me you wanted us to break up.
<PAGE>
I know you must've had a reason that you
couldn't come see me. I'm sorry I went and, um,
brought all this up.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
I'm glad we can still be together, though. I want
to stay with you for a long, long time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But, um, I'd be really happy if you'd come see
me a little more often.
<PAGE>
I can't help but get worried, after not seeing you
for so long.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh... You don't, huh?
<PAGE>
Okay. Then, um, I guess we should break up.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><ACTION_HEART_BREAK>Thanks for everything. I had a lot of fun being
your girlfriend.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
From now on, we're just friends.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<MYNAME>. Um... I have something I'd like to
talk to you about.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
You've been really cold to me lately,
<MYNAME>. You don't come to see me
anymore, and you barely even speak to me.
<PAGE>
Did something happen to make you hate me?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I really, really love you, so I want to spend lots
of time with you and talk with you a whole
bunch.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But...is that what you want? I mean, don't you
want to spend time with me? Don't you want
to...talk to me?
<PAGE>
If you don't, then I don't think we can be
together anymore.
<PAGE>
We'd have to...break up.
I don't want to break up.
Yeah. I think you're right.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Really? So you don't hate me...?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Yay! This was all just a silly notion I got in my
head, wasn't it? Whew! That's a relief.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'm really glad I get to be with you still. <RED>∀</RED>
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>But I'd be even gladder if you could make some
more time to come see me!
<PAGE>
I know you're super busy all the time, but I get
lonely when so much time goes by without the
two of us catching up.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
<ACTION_HEART_BREAK>...Okay. As of today, then, we're just friends.

<FACE_MENOU><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Thank you very much for everything. I hope we
can still be the best of friends forevermore!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. Excellent timing. I have something
very important I need to discuss with you.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
First, let me confirm something. We are, in fact,
still a couple. Correct?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>I can't help but be unsure of that these days.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
We've hardly spoken at all for some time now.
<PAGE>
Have I given you some reason to avoid me?
<PAGE>
If you'd like to break off our relationship, no need
to beat around the bush. Simply tell me you
want us to break up.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Whichever it is, please make it clear. I don't
know how much longer I can stand being left in
limbo like this.
I don't want to break up.
We should break up.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Are you sure you mean that?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>All right. If you insist, I'll take you at your word.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
However, I would appreciate it if you would
make more time to spend with me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>I start to feel very...out-of-sorts when I don't get
to see you often.
<PAGE>
If you want us to stay together, then I think, as
partners, there are certain responsibilities to
uphold. Don't you agree?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<ACTION_HEART_BREAK>I see. Well then, this is the end of our
relationship. Thank you very much for
everything.

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
From now on, we'll simply be friends.
<PAGE>
I won't hold any grudges, so please don't use
awkwardness as an excuse to avoid the clinic
when you're hurt.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>. Perfect timing. We need to talk.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Would it be better if we broke up?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Lately, you haven't come to see me at all.
<PAGE>
Today you finally stopped by, but it's like you
don't even notice I've missed you.
<PAGE>
And it seems like you've hardly missed me.
Honestly, I wonder if all that time apart even
bothers you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But me...I miss you. A lot. When I don't see you,
I find myself spending all day thinking about
you.
<PAGE>
So if things are just going to continue on like
this, I'm not sure I can stay as your girlfriend.
I'll come see you more.
We should break up.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Does that mean you don't want us to break
up...?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Good. Whew. I'm very glad to hear you say that.
<PAGE>
I didn't want to break up with you, either.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_LOSS>
I'm sorry I was so accusatory towards you. You
finally found the time to come visit me. I should
have been more grateful.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But like I said, I'm not strong enough as a
person to withstand these long absences.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'd be much happier if you could come and see
me more often, even if it is just to say hello.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>That way, I'll be better able to make it through
the days you can't come see me.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Yes, that would be best. It seems I'm not cut out
to interact with humans very much after all.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><ACTION_HEART_BREAK>Goodbye, <MYNAME>. I am glad we got to
spend the time together that we did.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
From now on, we are simply residents of the
same town. See you.
